Name: Irish Maid
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice.
Review: Fresh, juicy cucumber and elderflower with Irish whiskey and zesty lemon.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Jack McGarry at The Dead Rabbit , New York City, USA, this is an Irish-whiskey-based riff on Sam Ross' Kentucky Maid cocktail which is considered a contemporary classic.
